N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.517 - Records

State Regulations
(a) Each operator
shall make, and retain for the useful life of the pipeline, a record of each
test performed under sections 255.505 and
255.507
of this Part. The record
must contain at least the following information: (1)
the operator's name, the name of the
operator's employee responsible for making the test, and the name of any test
company used; (2)
test medium
used; (3)
test pressure; (4)
test duration; (5)
pressure record charts; (6)
elevation variations, whenever
significant for the particular test; and
(7)
leaks and failures noted and their
disposition. (b) Each
operator must maintain a record of each test required by section
255.511
of this Part for at least
five years. Notes
